abilities.name: Dwarven Resilience.
abilities.description: The dwarf has advantage on saving throws against poison and has resistance to poison damage

abilities.name: Divine Eminence.
abilities.description: As a bonus action, the priest can expend a spell slot to cause its melee weapon attacks to magically deal an extra 10 (3d6) radiant damage to a target on a hit. This benefit lasts until the end of the turn. If the priest expends a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the extra damage increases by 1d6 for each level above 1st.

abilities.name: Spellcasting.
abilities.description:
The priest is a 5th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Wisdom. The priest has the following cleric spells prepared:
* Cantrips (at will): light, sacred flame, thaumaturgy
* 1st level (4 slots): cure wounds, guiding bolt, sanctuary
* 2nd level (3 slots): lesser restoration, spiritual weapon
* 3rd level (2 slots): dispel magic, spirit guardians
